channel.title: Learn Robotics
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© 2017, Learn Robotics; All rights reserved.

item.title: About
item.description:
Join the Robotics Revolution!




Learn Robotics was founded with the purpose of bringing high-quality robotics and programming classes to the Greater Indianapolis community.

If you hadn’t already guessed it, WE LOVE ROBOTS & we think you’ll love them too!

Face it, automation, software, and robots are all around us. We live in a world packed with tech, computers, and “smart” devices. Let us teach you how to join this Robotics Revolution with class offerings such as Robotics Foundations and Electronics & Sensing.



Who We Are

We love to teach youth how to develop, construct, code, and play with, you guessed it, ROBOTS!

Started by Robotics Engineer, Liz Miller, Learn Robotics is a full service-to-hire robotics education startup focused on bringing quality introductory and intermediate robotics classes to youth and young adults within Indianapolis organizations.

From curriculum development, to providing robot kits and laptops, to teaching the course, Learn Robotics does it all. Full Service means full service! Just create your custom course using our Online Course Builder, and we’ll send you an estimate for your custom course within 2-3 business days.


Meet your Lead Instructor, Liz!

Liz holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Robotics Engineering from Worcester Polytechnic Institute. She has taught 100’s of introductory robotics classes to elementary, middle, and high school students throughout New England. Liz’s most recent teaching gig was at Massachusetts Institute of Technology! Liz works full-time in high-volume automated manufacturing where she maintains robotic arms and industrial equipment. Liz’s love for teaching robotics led her to design and launch Learn Robotics within the Greater Indianapolis community!


What We Do

A big part of Learn Robotics is overcoming the learning curve of beginning robot programming. We pride ourselves on making classes engaging, interactive, and informative. Quality education is our #1 goal, but having fun is our #1 priority! The curriculum for each Learn Robotics class is designed so that students of varying backgrounds will have a functioning robot to use in class challenges!

item.title: Classes & Services
item.description:
CLASSES

Introductory Seminar

A 1-hour lecture-style informational talk on robotics. Demo included.


4-Hour Class

A 4-hour class filled with hands-on interaction and instruction about robotics, electronics, and programming.


6-Hour Class

An extension of our 4-hour class, but with added time for in-class challenges.


Fill out our Class Survey

Did you take a class? Please provide your feedback!

Complete Survey


SERVICES

Custom Community Programs

We create Robotics, Computer Programming, and Electronics Classes for ages 8-12 and 13-17, and 18+, hosted at your location.

Types of groups we work with:

  • Public, Private, & Home Schools
  • Museums
  • Community Groups
  • Boy Scouts & Girl Scouts
  • Boys & Girls Clubs
  • Fraternal and Civic Organizations & Clubs
  • Robotics Teams
  • Science Organizations
  • Rec Centers
  • And More!

Types of events we hold:

  • After School Programs
  • Weekend Workshops & Sessions
  • Fall, Winter, Spring Break & Summer Vacation Programs
  • Private Events (Individual groups & Birthday Parties)
  • Public Events
  • Your Custom Event


Use our Online Class Builder to design your Custom Class!

Create a Custom Class


Curriculum Development

From the first-time programmer, to a technical guru, our class curriculum is enriching and engaging for all!

Have a specific curriculum goal in mind? We’ll work with you to ensure that we meet your course objectives!

Attention Boy Scouts & Girl Scouts!
We now have a program to help you earn your technical badges. Contact Us to arrange a special badging event!


Kits, Certificates, & Snacks

All classes include options for renting/owning Robotics Kits, obtaining Course Certificates, and of course Snacks & Drinks!

item.title: Contact
item.description:
We are here to help you

At Learn Robotics, QUALITY education is our #1 goal, but having FUN is our #1 priority!


Have a question or comment?

Please feel free to contact us via the methods below! We will do our best to respond to your inquiries within 24-hours.


860-578-4459
liz@learnrobotics.org

Like Us on Facebook!


Partner With Us

Are you curious about hosting or sponsoring a Learn Robotics event?

Looking to offer a Learn Robotics class at your organization? Contact Us using the form below, and we will arrange a meeting to discuss the best class options!
